User_LanguageObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

User_LanguageObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

User_LanguageObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Attribute_Reference.description: Workday internal use only. Customers should not populate this column.

Public_Translated_Value_for_Instance_Dat.description: A unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Enter the translated value of the instance in the corresponding User Language and in plain text.
Enter the translated value of the instance in the corresponding User Language and in rich text.

Public_Translatable_Class_Attribute_Data.description: Translatable data in base language and target languages.

validation.validation: Instance Reference is not valid. Only tenanted instances can be uploaded for translation.

description: Parameters that specify the context of the translatation tasks.

validation.validation: Attribute is not translatable for specified Class.
